医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
COVID-19 与较高的糖尿病风险有关，疫苗接种可减少影响COVID-19 显着增加 2 型糖尿病的发病率，特别是在未接种疫苗的个体和住院患者中。 COVID-19 后的疫苗接种和定期糖尿病筛查对于管理长期健康影响至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/COVID-19-linked-to-higher-diabetes-risk-vaccination-reduces-impact.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/COVID-19-linked-to-higher-diabetes-risk-vaccination-reduces-impact.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be92e9b2-abcf-47f6-9bc9-117c7ac3a25e Wed, 07 Aug 2024 21:10:00 -0400 COVID-19 linked to higher diabetes risk, vaccination reduces impact
研究发现农药接触与死产风险之间存在关联梅尔和伊妮德·祖克曼公共卫生学院和西南环境健康科学中心的研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，受孕前和怀孕初期，居住在距离使用农药不到三分之一英里的地方可能会增加死产的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Study-finds-association- Between-pesticide-exposure-and-stillbirth-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Study-finds-association- Between-pesticide-exposure-and-stillbirth-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d182332b-fac6-4ef4-9e40-139129e56f1f Wed, 07 Aug 2024 21:00:00 -0400 Study finds association between pesticide exposure and stillbirth risk
研究表明互联网排斥与老年人抑郁症增加有关被排除在互联网之外的老年人出现抑郁症状的风险较高，尤其是经济贫困和教育水平较低的人。解决互联网排斥问题对于改善这一人群的心理健康至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Study-links-internet-exclusion-to-increased-depression-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Study-links-internet-exclusion-to-increased-depression-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29c44a14-5789-48fc-9a2a-34d0758ddb96 Wed, 07 Aug 2024 21:00:00 -0400 Study links internet exclusion to increased depression in older adults
新疗法可促进小鼠多能干细胞的产生基因组调控中心 (CRG) 的研究人员发现了一种可以加速小鼠多能干细胞生成和质量的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/New-treatment-boosts-pluripot-stem-cell-product-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/New-treatment-boosts-pluripotency-stem-cell-production-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b936658-83e5-48d3-84c7-a89200ab5a4b Wed, 07 Aug 2024 20:53:58 -0400 New treatment boosts pluripotent stem cell production in mice
研究表明关键脑细胞有助于抵抗食物诱惑而有利于运动下丘脑分泌素/食欲素神经元（HON）对于抵抗诱惑和选择运动而非美味食物至关重要。这一发现凸显了促进身体活动和对抗肥胖的潜在目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Study-reveals-key-brain-cells-help-resist-food-temptations-in-favor-of-exercise.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Study-reveals-key-brain-cells-help-resist-food-temptations-in-favor-of-exercise.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=937c6e4a-70e1-4fc8-a201-7e88a70674ec Wed, 07 Aug 2024 20:50:00 -0400 Study reveals key brain cells help resist food temptations in favor of exercise
新型绷带利用电场促进慢性伤口愈合研究人员开发了一种廉价的绷带，利用电场促进慢性伤口的愈合。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Novel-bandage-uses-electric-field-to-promote-healing-in-chronic-wounds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Novel-bandage-uses-electric-field-to-promote-healing-in-chronic-wounds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e2a6bd6-0cf1-46fe-8bfd-2394021e54b1 Wed, 07 Aug 2024 20:45:49 -0400 Novel bandage uses electric field to promote healing in chronic wounds
1 型糖尿病会影响味觉和风味识别吗？ 1 型糖尿病患者的味觉和风味感知能力下降，影响食物偏好和生活质量。这凸显了进一步研究 T1D 感觉变化的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Does-type-1-diabetes-affect-taste-and-flavor-recognition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Does-type-1-diabetes-affect-taste-and-flavor-recognition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da8e4104-4a26-48bf-976f-2867122917db Wed, 07 Aug 2024 20:42:00 -0400 Does type 1 diabetes affect taste and flavor recognition?
康奈尔大学的研究表明花粉大量繁殖与哮喘相关急诊就诊人数激增有关康奈尔大学的一项新研究追踪了大都市地区有多少例因花粉而导致哮喘相关的急诊室就诊，该研究强调了了解当地植物的重要性以及开发基于科学的花粉预测的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Cornell-study-links-pollen-blooms-to-spike-in-asthma-lated-ER-visits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Cornell-study-links-pollen-blooms-to-spike-in-asthma-lated-ER-visits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6fdb1a96-d2b4-4a9c-b391-9556b29ff954 Wed, 07 Aug 2024 20:40:44 -0400 Cornell study links pollen blooms to spike in asthma-related ER visits
治疗心力衰竭的新干细胞疗法正在进行美国临床试验路易斯维尔大学和 UofL Health 正在对一种新的心力衰竭干细胞疗法进行测试。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/New-stem-cell-therapy-for-heart-failure-undergoing-US-clinical-trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/New-stem-cell-therapy-for-heart-failure-undergoing-US-clinical-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8df0b6bf-775c-453b-9658-ae36cbbf98a3 Wed, 07 Aug 2024 20:36:00 -0400 New stem cell therapy for heart failure undergoing U.S. clinical trials
中风入院时高血糖与不良预后相关因缺血性中风入院时血糖水平高于正常水平会显着增加中风后三个月内功能预后不良或死亡的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/High-blood-sugar-at-中风-admission-linked-to-poor-prognosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/High-blood-sugar-at-中风-admission-linked-to-poor-prognosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0bf865f5-3770-45ae-8f8b-3b0460446d44 Wed, 07 Aug 2024 20:29:15 -0400 High blood sugar at stroke admission linked to poor prognosis
